DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification of the device type used to inject an imaging contrast agent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging._Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue._A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging.

Concepts.definition: A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging.

Property.preferredName: Contrast Agent Injection System Device Component

Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue.:A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

Concepts.definition: Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue.
A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue._A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.

PermissibleValues.value: Dual chamber power injector with saline flush
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Dual Chamber Power Injector With Saline Flush

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Dual Chamber Power Injector With Saline Flush
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.: A saline solution used to force an agent from tubing and peripheral veins into the central blood volume.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A saline solution used to force an agent from tubing and peripheral veins into the central blood volume.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with one enclosed reservoir, designed to deliver intravenous contrast agent.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with one enclosed reservoir, designed to deliver intravenous contrast agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
